verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Eb
As we drink this cup
We worship You
As we eat this bread
We honor You
And we offer You our lives
As You have offered Yours for us

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
We remember all You've done for us
We remember Your covenant with us
We remember and worship You O Lord
